oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Forensics Meet the Imagination of the Blind: Getting Positive Media Attention on "Can the Blind Solve the Crime?" Is there substantial evidence in imagination?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bryant, Toriano
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Close your eyes and try to remember where you placed your keys. Did you hear that? Sto. I believe the sound is coming from the opposite direction. In the imagination world these sensory techniques are crucial. But can they be used to help solve crimes?
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Instars: A Journal of Student Research; Vol. 7 No. 1 (2022): Instars: A Journal of Student Research
